ygData.subject: Re: Cheap Rivervale Merchants
ygData.msgSnippet: Kill blue mobs - try yeller ones too if you have full health. Don t buy food - attack a yeller mob instead.  Kill gobbies that you see carrying weps. weps are
ygData.messageBody:
Kill blue mobs - try yeller ones too if you have full health. Don't buy food
- attack a yeller mob instead. Kill gobbies that you see carrying weps.
weps are good loots to sell. take up tailoring as soon as you can afford to
buy the small kit (don't buy the how to sew - ask other players if you don't
want a spoiler from web) and make patch work. If you get "chunk of meat" you
can use as food. But you should be dieing a lot in order to get your levels
and have no problem with food.

Maybe I am missing something? Maybe your play style is that you don't want
to die? If so, I applaud you but if you want to level faster, you need to
be taking more and more risks and take advantage of the no xp loss under
level 6. Gamey? yes. But you keep asking how to get levels.

Sylly
Bard of the 13th level
a.k.a. Robo-Bard
camped out in Qeynos on Innoruuk


-----Original Message-----
From: weya [mailto:weya@...]
Sent: Wednesday, July 07, 1999 8:10 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] Cheap Rivervale Merchants

From: weya <weya@...>

Oh, the prices I'm getting paid for fire beetle eyes is
barely over 1
silver a piece ... so I know I'm getting gipped. I know I
got more for
the same thing in Freeport from the bard guild. Same with
the snake
teeth and skins. I have barely 5 gold or so (can't remember
exactly
right now) after an entire level and a half of hunting in
Rivervale ...
and no buying anything. I've either died or foraged food &
water for
myself. I'm still using all my newbie stuff.

I'm killing bixies as much as I can ... which isn't hard ...
they crawl
out of the woodwork to attack me, lol.

Safe travels,
Wynsong
Woodelf Bard, Level 3 (and a half! ;-)
Rivervale, Quellious

Message: 16
Date: Wed, 7 Jul 1999 14:02:47 -0400
From: "Fun Bob" <fun-bob@...>
Subject: Re: Rivervale to Qeynos?

Just one more piece of advice. From what I remember of being
level 3,
anything you can kill's loot sucks. I dont think your
getting gipped as
much
as the loot just sucks....
